verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We bow our hearts,
We bend our knees.
Spirit, come make us humble.
We turn our eyes
From evil things;
Lord, we cast down our idols.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Give us clean hands, give us pure hearts;
Let us not lift our souls to another. (2x)
O God, let us be a generation that seeks,
That seeks Your face, oh God of Jacob. (2x)
